## Midair Crouching [mkwcat]

This code allows you to crouch in midair, replacing the ground pound input.

This code is for New Super Mario Bros. Wii. Many revisions may be untested.

<details>
<summary>PAL Rev 1</summary>

```hex
C61267F0 8012D5D0
C614E620 8014DCF0
C212D9FC 00000005
48000009 C0000000
7D2802A6 C03F00EC
C0490000 FC011040
40800008 D01F00EC
60000000 00000000
C214DEC4 00000004
881F152C 2C000002
4181000C 38000001
981F152D 80010014
60000000 00000000
```
</details>
